price: Sọ fún mi nípa ẹni tí ó sọ ìfẹ́-inú rẹ̀ di ọlọ́hun rẹ̀! Nítorí náà, ṣé ìwọ máa jẹ́ aláàbò fún un ni (níbi ìyà)?
arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِ وَكِيلًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilāhahu hawāhu afa-anta takūnu ʿalayhi wakīlan
